summary: Provides a command‑line utility that runs NeMo CTC‑based speech‑to‑text models in a non‑Lightning environment, processing audio files in buffered chunks for efficient batch transcription and outputting the results to files.
business_intent: Enables developers and CI pipelines to quickly evaluate and deploy pretrained CTC speech recognition models on large audio datasets without the overhead of PyTorch Lightning, supporting scalable inference and automated testing.
